attributes.action: Allow adults indoor classes for fitness/dance/tennis in all tiers
attributes.additional_details: I feel allowing the gyms and dance schools to open indoors helps adults fitness,mental wellbeing and physical health. In the winter it will become too cold to do outdoor classes. I feel adults may become ill as they will get cold. In both gyms and dance schools it was very covid secure. Please allow us the same opportunities as children. Our mental health is just as important as children’s.
attributes.background: I would like the government to change the rules with immediate effect.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign these two petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555618
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956
